Description: FTP access mark; numeric; 0 - no, 1 - yes
auto sending; numeric; 0 - No, 1 - Yes (documents are automatically sent when the document is transferred to the outbox)
creation of status files; numeric; 0 - No, 1 - Yes, 2 - Yes, about delivery, 3 - Yes, about reading
does the user have administrator rights (mark); numeric; 0 - no, 1 - yes
